verses.text: And \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* went \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w told|strong="H0559"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, Let my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, that they may hold a \w feast|strong="H2287"\w* unto me in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

And \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Who \add is\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, that I should \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* to let \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*? I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* not the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, neither will I let \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*.

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w* hath \w met|strong="H7122"\w* with us: let us \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, we pray thee, \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days’|strong="H3117"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w* into the \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*, and \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; lest he \w fall|strong="H6293"\w* upon us with \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*, or with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Wherefore do ye, \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w let|strong="H6544"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* from their \w works|strong="H4639"\w*? \w get|strong="H3212"\w* you unto your \w burdens|strong="H5450"\w*.

And \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* now \add are\add* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*, and ye make them \w rest|strong="H7673"\w* from their \w burdens|strong="H5450"\w*.

And \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* the same \w day|strong="H3117"\w* the \w taskmasters|strong="H5065"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and their \w officers|strong="H7860"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Ye shall no \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w straw|strong="H8401"\w* to \w make|strong="H3835"\w* \w brick|strong="H3843"\w*, as \w heretofore|strong="H8032"\w*: let them \w go|strong="H3212"\w* and \w gather|strong="H7197"\w* \w straw|strong="H8401"\w* for themselves.

And the \w tale|strong="H4971"\w* of the \w bricks|strong="H3843"\w*, which they did \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w heretofore|strong="H8032"\w*, ye shall \w lay|strong="H7760"\w* upon them; ye shall not \w diminish|strong="H1639"\w* \add ought\add* thereof: for they \add be\add* \w idle|strong="H7503"\w*; therefore they \w cry|strong="H6817"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Let us \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \add and\add* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* to our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Let there more \w work|strong="H5656"\w* be \w laid|strong="H3513"\w* upon the \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, that they may \w labour|strong="H6213"\w* therein; and let them not \w regard|strong="H8159"\w* \w vain|strong="H8267"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.\f + \fr 5.9 \ft Let there…: Heb. Let the work be heavy upon the men\f*

¶ And the \w taskmasters|strong="H5065"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and their \w officers|strong="H7860"\w*, and they \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, I will not \w give|strong="H5414"\w* you \w straw|strong="H8401"\w*.

\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* ye, \w get|strong="H3947"\w* you \w straw|strong="H8401"\w* \w where|strong="H0834"\w* ye can \w find|strong="H4672"\w* it: \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* not \w ought|strong="H1697"\w* of your \w work|strong="H5656"\w* shall be \w diminished|strong="H1639"\w*.

So the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* were scattered \w abroad|strong="H6327"\w* throughout all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* to \w gather|strong="H7197"\w* \w stubble|strong="H7179"\w* instead of \w straw|strong="H8401"\w*.

And the \w taskmasters|strong="H5065"\w* \w hasted|strong="H0213"\w* \add them\add*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Fulfil|strong="H3615"\w* your \w works|strong="H4639"\w*, \add your\add* \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* \w tasks|strong="H1697"\w*, as when there \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w straw|strong="H8401"\w*.\f + \fr 5.13 \ft your daily…: Heb. a matter of a day in his day\f*

And the \w officers|strong="H7860"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w taskmasters|strong="H5065"\w* had \w set|strong="H7760"\w* over them, were \w beaten|strong="H5221"\w*, \add and\add* \w demanded|strong="H0559"\w*, Wherefore have ye not \w fulfilled|strong="H3615"\w* your \w task|strong="H2706"\w* in making \w brick|strong="H3835"\w* both \w yesterday|strong="H8543"\w* and to \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, as \w heretofore|strong="H8032"\w*?

¶ Then the \w officers|strong="H7860"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* unto \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Wherefore \w dealest|strong="H6213"\w* thou thus with thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*?

There is no \w straw|strong="H8401"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* unto thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and they \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to us, \w Make|strong="H6213"\w* \w brick|strong="H3843"\w*: and, behold, thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \add are\add* \w beaten|strong="H5221"\w*; but the \w fault|strong="H2398"\w* \add is\add* in thine own \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

But he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Ye \add are\add* \w idle|strong="H7503"\w*, \add ye are\add* \w idle|strong="H7503"\w*: therefore ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Let us \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \add and\add* do \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* therefore now, \add and\add* \w work|strong="H5647"\w*; for there shall no \w straw|strong="H8401"\w* be \w given|strong="H5414"\w* you, yet shall ye \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* the \w tale|strong="H8506"\w* of \w bricks|strong="H3843"\w*.

And the \w officers|strong="H7860"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* did \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \add that\add* they \add were\add* in \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \add case\add*, after it was \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Ye shall not \w minish|strong="H1639"\w* \add ought\add* from your \w bricks|strong="H3843"\w* of your \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* \w task|strong="H1697"\w*.

¶ And they \w met|strong="H6293"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, who \w stood|strong="H5324"\w* in the \w way|strong="H7125"\w*, as they came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* from \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*:

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w look|strong="H7200"\w* upon you, and \w judge|strong="H8199"\w*; because ye have made our \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* to be \w abhorred|strong="H0887"\w* in the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and in the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, to \w put|strong="H5414"\w* a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* in their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* to \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* us.\f + \fr 5.21 \ft to be…: Heb. to stink\f*

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, wherefore hast thou \add so\add* evil \w entreated|strong="H7489"\w* this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*? why \add is\add* it \add that\add* thou hast \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me?

For since I \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* in thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, he hath done \w evil|strong="H7489"\w* to this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; neither hast thou \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* at \w all|strong="H5337"\w*.\f + \fr 5.23 \ft neither…: Heb. delivering thou hast not delivered\f*
